name: The Greater Train Robbery
description:
A 4-player co-op map based on the campaign map The Great Train Robbery.

Difficulty scales for 2-4 players. A general difficulty (easy-brutal) is also selectable in the lobby. Search for "greater" in europe, or feel free to upload and play in other regions.



This map is part of a series of 4-player co-op maps based on the campaign. See also:

- [The Devil's Yard](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/devils-yard/>)

<!-- -->
author: _ForgeUser4370295
